alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bath, southeastern Fleming and Rowan Counties through 1115 AM EST... At 1045 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Polksville, or near Owingsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Midland around 1050 AM EST. Ramey, Farmers, Freestone, Bluestone, Sharkey and Cogswell around 1055 AM EST. Brandy and Hilda around 1100 AM EST. Morehead, Munson, Hays Crossing, Clearfield and Pelfrey around 1105 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rodburn, Christy, Cranston, Crix, Waltz, Gates, Haldeman, Triplett, Vale, Elliottville and Wagner Store. THIS INCLUDES Interstate 64 in eastern Kentucky between mile markers 120 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
